LanguageData.SeafoodFarmKelp.label: Kelp Farm
LanguageData.SeafoodFarmKelp.description: A simple vertical ocean farm, spawning Kelp, Mussels and Oysters over time. Can only be built in ocean water.
LanguageData.SeafoodFarmSeaweed.label: Seaweed Farm
LanguageData.SeafoodFarmSeaweed.description: A simple vertical ocean farm, spawning Seaweed, Mussels and Oysters over time. Can only be built in ocean water.
